alert.note: Alert for Waseca (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 29 at 7:35AM CDT until May 29 at 8:00AM CDT by NWS Minneapolis
info.description: The National Weather Service in the Twin Cities has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Waseca County in south central Minnesota... * Until 800 AM CDT. * At 733 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Waldorf, or 21 miles northwest of Albert Lea, moving northeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... New Richland around 740 AM CDT. Waseca around 750 AM CDT. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
